Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Requires the department of veterans' services to provide certain assistance to veterans
Summary: Requires the department of veterans' services to provide legal and/or technical support to veterans who want to change their discharged status to honorable because such person was dishonorably or administratively discharged from the armed services due to sexual orientation.
LawCode: Amd ยง4, Veterans' Services L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law, in relation to providing certain support for veterans to help alter their discharged status
